players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Diana is the mafia. Bob was a villager, so we should suspect her."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafia, because he is the only one who knows Bob was a villager."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them to be the mafia. Bob was a villager. Charlie knows I'm detective, so they are lying. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice, your investigation of Charlie is correct. He is lying. Vote Charlie."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was a villager. Charlie knows I'm detective, so he will lie. No evidence against Diana. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
